## File 1: .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md

```markdown
---
name: Bug Report
about: Report a problem with a profile or the project
title: '[BUG] '
labels: bug
assignees: ''
---

## Bug Description
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## Profile Affected
Which configuration file is causing the issue?
- [ ] config_party.txt
- [ ] config_hiphop.txt
- [ ] config_worship.txt
- [ ] Other: _______________

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Load profile '...'
2. Play audio type '...'
3. Set volume to '...'
4. Observe behavior '...'

## Expected Behavior
What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened.

## Audio Distortion Details (if applicable)
- [ ] Clipping/distortion at high volume
- [ ] Clipping/distortion at moderate volume
- [ ] Clipping/distortion at low volume
- [ ] Muddy or unclear sound
- [ ] Too much bass
- [ ] Not enough bass
- [ ] Other: _______________

## System Information
**Required:**
- Equalizer APO Version: [e.g., 1.3]
- Windows Version: [e.g., Windows 11 Pro]
- Audio Hardware: [e.g., Logitech Z906 5.1 system]
- Subwoofer: [Yes/No, model if applicable]

**Optional but helpful:**
- Sound card: [e.g., Realtek HD Audio]
- Other audio software: [e.g., Voicemeeter, etc.]

## Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots of:
- Equalizer APO Configuration Editor
- The issue occurring
- Volume levels

## Additional Context
Any other information that might help diagnose the problem.

## Attempted Solutions
What have you already tried to fix this?
- [ ] Adjusted preamp value
- [ ] Reduced bass gains
- [ ] Tried different profile
- [ ] Reinstalled Equalizer APO
- [ ] Other: _______________
```
